content: @aemilia creates @aemilia-creates potato the cat free pattern @aemilia creates materials yarn i used caron simply soft camo yarn weight 4 and 1 strand of worsted weight light pink hook 3 0 mm eyes 8mm safety eyes abbreviations chain = chain st = stitch single_crochet = single_crochet single_crochet increase = 2sc in one st inv decrease = invisible decrease half_double_crochet = half double crochet double_crochet = double_crochet bobble = bobble stitch body 1 6sc in magic_ring 6 2 single_crochet single_crochet increase * 2 working in blo single_crochet 1 working in both loops single_crochet increase 9 3 single_crochet increase * 9 18 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet increase * 6 24 5 single_crochet 3 single_crochet increase * 6 30 6 single_crochet 15 working in flo single_crochet 1 chain 4 slip_stitch in second chain from hook half_double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in last chain skip 1 st on the main circle slip_stitch in flo of next stitch working in both loops single_crochet 4 working in flo single_crochet 1 chain 4 slip_stitch in second chain from hook half_double_crochet in next chain double_crochet in last chain skip 1 st on the main circle slip_stitch in flo of next stitch single_crochet 4 to finish the round next page… @aemilia creates 7 single_crochet around in blo 28 but if it s off by 1-2 we can fix it later so keep going 8 single_crochet 4 bobble single_crochet 2 bobble single_crochet the rest of the way around 28 or same as row 7 9-12 single_crochet around *as you do these increase or decrease as necessary to make it 28 by the end* 28 13 single_crochet 4 bobble single_crochet 4 bobble single_crochet 18 28 add face eyes go between row 3-4 nose is embroidered in a triangle shape between row 2-3 below the eyes 14 single_crochet 5 inv decrease * 4 24 15 single_crochet 4 inv decrease * 4 20 16 single_crochet 3 inv decrease * 4 16 17 single_crochet 2 inv decrease * 4 12 18 single_crochet inv decrease * 4 8 close and fasten_off @aemilia creates tail chain 13 single_crochet in second chain from hook single_crochet 11 in the rest of the chain fasten_off and sew onto the body please tag me @aemilia creates on instagram if you make this pattern you can sell any items created from this pattern but please include a note that says pattern by aemilia @aemilia creates thank you and happy crocheting
